sourcesContent:
{{ toast.message }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ToastService, Toast } from '../../services/toast.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-toast', templateUrl: './toast.component.html', styleUrls: ['./toast.component.scss'] }) export class ToastComponent implements OnInit { toast: Toast | null = null; constructor(private toastService: ToastService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.toastService.toast$.subscribe((toast) => { this.toast = toast; }); } }
